abstract: Herbert A Hauptman, mathematician who shared the 1985 Nobel Prize in Chemistry with Jerome Karle for their development of revolutionary methods for determining the structure of molecules vital to life, dies at age 94.
snippet: Dr. Hauptman, a mathematician, shared the 1985 Nobel Prize in chemistry with Jerome Karle for their revolutionary methods of studying molecular structure.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Hauptman, a mathematician, shared the 1985 Nobel Prize in chemistry with Jerome Karle for their revolutionary methods of studying molecular structure.

headline.main: Herbert A. Hauptman, Nobel Laureate, Dies at 94
headline.seo: Herbert A. Hauptman, Nobel-Winning Mathematician, Dies at 94
